title: How to Get These Riven Stats
body:
http://i.imgur.com/xTZGudn.jpg

Heck there is no way I can get those stats AND match it to one of The shys rune pages on his op.gg

http://www.op.gg/summoner/userName=The%20shy

The game is 3 days old so I don't see any issues with a random rune page change and there were no nerfs or buffs added.

Please help ;)

NOTE:

The problem is the fact that he is getting +7 AR and + 11 MR. He also has 4% apen and mpen so I cant find a **combination of he current rune pages **and masteries to give me those numbers.
